message: I feel for your loss. No parent should have to suffer the loss of a child. However, you cannot legislate away stupid. Unless you're one of the .0001 percent of the population that doesn't feel pain, you know when it's hot out and the precautions we were all taught in kindergarten how to protect ourselves from it. No amount of 'visual deterrents' can replace common sense.
